Row.Text: The construction of buildings within the capital caused every city connected to the capital to enter resistance for 3 turns in exchange for all their outputs to be doubled for 5 turns after.
In order to get around the restrictions on buying Uranium, Indira Gandhi decided to establish laboratories at Pokhran to help gather Uranium discretely to build nukes.

The Pokhran Lab is a Modern-era building unique to India, replacing the Research Lab. In addition to +4 [ICON_RESEARCH] and a 50% [ICON_RESEARCH] production, the city it is built it in recieves 1 [RES_URANIUM] for each Desert Hill tile worked by the city and a 75% reduction in nuke production cost.
